content.rendered:
Directed by Vikram Bhatt

Written by Rhea Anand. Vikram Bhatt. Vikram Bhatt. Rajkumar Janghare. Sandeep Prabhu. Srivinay Salian

Cast Hina Khan (Sameera Khanna). Sheetal Dabholkar (Nandini). Rohan Shah (Vivek). Sid Makkar (Om Kapoor). Sanjay Gurbaxani (Vivek’s Father).Sujeet Kumar Sharma. Tanvi Thakkar (Riya).Komal Chhabria. Mohit Malhotra (Rohan Mehra). Pravina Bhagwat Deshpande (Vivek’s mother). Ashutosh Jha (Rane). Amir Malik (Friend Avinash (office)). Faiz Technical (Hacker boy). Jayesh Raj (Cyber Expert Vinod Mehra). Vishal Dave (Interrogator). Manusmit Rana (News Anchor). Garrvil Mohan (Dr. Ravi Sinha). Vyas Hemang (Inspector Markande). Rohit Raj Singh (Mr. Rajak).Pravina Deshpande. SelÃ§uk Sahin (Cyber Army).Ram Naresh Diwakar

Languages Hindi

Producers Mehboob Ansari. Krishna Bhatt. Dhanashree Mehta. Jatin Sethi. Pradeep Singh. Amar P. Thakkar

Production Loneranger Production. Naad Film
